Title: AI Toolkit + GitHub Copilot - Pt. 4:  Generate Agent Code
Description:
This video is Part 4 of the AI Toolkit + GitHub Copilot video series. This video is part of the GitHub Copilot + AI Toolkit Pet Planner workshop. View the repo and instructions: https://aka.ms/AIToolkit/workshop

Join April as she transitions from creating an agent in the AI Toolkitâ€™s Agent Builder to generating the code for the agent. Once the code is generated, April shows you how to set up your local environment to run the agent code. With the agent code, developers can continue refining their agent with additional logic and leverage Copilot for assistance.
